price: Kuma lalle ne, Mun bai wa Mũsã Littãfi, kuma Mun sanya ɗan'uwansa, Hãrũna, mataimaki tãre da shi.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَجَعَلۡنَا مَعَهُۥٓ أَخَاهُ هَٰرُونَ وَزِيرٗا

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynā mūsā al-kitāba wajaʿalnā maʿahu akhāhu hārūna wazīran
